类的使用
org.springframework.web.servlet.support.ServletUriComponentsBuilder

  • 使用ServletUriComponentsBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.servlet.support
    Support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.support中ServletUriComponentsBuilder的使用

      返回ServletUriComponentsBuilder的org.springframework.web.servlet.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromContextPath(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Prepare a builder from the host, port, scheme, and context path of an HttpServletRequest.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromCurrentContextPath()
      Same as fromContextPath(HttpServletRequest) except the request is obtained through RequestContextHolder.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromCurrentRequest()
      Same as fromRequest(HttpServletRequest) except the request is obtained through RequestContextHolder.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromCurrentRequestUri()
      Same as fromRequestUri(HttpServletRequest) except the request is obtained through RequestContextHolder.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromCurrentServletMapping()
      Same as fromServletMapping(HttpServletRequest) except the request is obtained through RequestContextHolder.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Prepare a builder by copying the scheme, host, port, path, and query string of an HttpServletRequest.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromRequestUri(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Prepare a builder from the host, port, scheme, and path of an HttpServletRequest.
      static ServletUriComponentsBuilder ServletUriComponentsBuilder.fromServletMapping(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Prepare a builder from the host, port, scheme, context path, and servlet mapping of an HttpServletRequest.
